reviews.content: Snapback will restore to the snapshot and reboot. When rejailbreaking it still has remnants of the previous snapshot and had to restore rootfs in checkra1n to fix it.
Needs a way too keep the snapshots after rootfs so you could have images with different jailbreaks. Also would be nice to import/export snapshots in the app but other than that works great
Must have if you want to swap from Chimera and unc0ver.
Before reporting “broken” be sure to read how to use it.

Works great ! 
(Reviewed by @iTollMouS XS Max owner)
